body: Please provide a demo for your chart: https://jsfiddle.net/ovilia/n6xc4df3/
enterable: true 并不会阻止 tooltip 消失，需要设置 https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#tooltip.alwaysShowContent 才行，这不是 bug
请使用不同的 name 给不同的数据，如果要显示为同样的文字，可以通过 [label.formatter](https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#series-pie.label.formatter) 修改显示文字。
This issue is closed due to not being active. Please feel free to open it again (for the author) or create a new one and reference this (for others) if you have further questions.
请通过自定义系列实现效果

This issue is not created using [issue template](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-issue-helper/) so I'm going to close it. 🙊
Sorry for this, but it helps save our maintainers' time so that more developers get helped.
Feel free to create another issue using the issue template.

这个 issue 未使用 [issue 模板](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-issue-helper/?lang=zh-cn) 创建，所以我将关闭此 issue。
为此带来的麻烦我深表歉意，但是请理解这是为了节约社区维护者的时间，以更高效地服务社区的开发者群体。
如果您愿意，可以请使用 issue 模板重新创建 issue。

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵

有demo吗


来自 魅族 PRO 6 Plus

-------- 原始邮件 --------
发件人：Ovilia <notifications@github.com>
时间：2019年6月28日 15:58
收件人：apache/incubator-echarts <incubator-echarts@noreply.github.com>
抄送：sldeng <13163374901@163.com>,Author <author@noreply.github.com>
主题：Re: [apache/incubator-echarts] 微信小程序 tab切换图表显示不正常 (#10753)

>切换 tab 的时候调用一下 chart.resize()
>
>—
>You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
>Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.￼
>

Hi @MINDoSOFT,  we have added `All` and `Inverse` selection button for the legend, which result is this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13548221/60331749-efaaca80-99c7-11e9-9f55-7b8805e91622.png)
With these, you can quickly show the series you want.
This new feature has already pushed to master branch and will be released in some next version. Anyway, thank you for your suggestion.
我的没没有效果， 各位找到解决方法了吗/(ㄒoㄒ)/~~

希望实现的效果，红蓝交界处不希望颜色渐变
https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xI66JhpOSe&v=2
只是减少了visualMap中pieces数组中的项，但是多余的项看起来应该不影响显示

It doesn't work for me. I mean the calendar can show, but there's no graph and color showed on the calendar chart. I tried it in different browsers (chrome, safari, firefox, incognito mode) and also cleared the cache.
The error is: 
```
editor.js?_v_=1559800464994:1 
TypeError: Cannot read property '__focusNodeAdjacency' of undefined
    at echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22
    at IL.TL.eachEdge (echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22)
    at i.render (echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22)
    at mr.progress (echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22)
    at vr (echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22)
    at mr.UI.perform (echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22)
    at echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22
    at i.<anonymous> (echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22)
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at d (echarts.min.js?_v_=1559800464994:22)
```

Hello,
I have the same problem. Please see screenshots below.

![ECharts-Error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1531957/60372331-2aedcf00-99b1-11e9-84e7-28820bc68374.jpg)
![Screen Shot 2019-06-28 at 10 39 51 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1531957/60372417-68525c80-99b1-11e9-8dd6-bd91ac78973f.png)

> @Ovilia 那这样不能设置公共的方法。只能写几种情况。如果数量为1设置一种，数量为2设置一种，以此类推...

如果数量很多的时候，不确定哪一部分的密度最高，出现大量的label堆叠的情况怎么办。。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17211710/60379772-4b7a5f80-9a6b-11e9-8bc4-8725042fd10e.png)

@Ovilia 请问这个bug在什么时候会修复呀？下个版本吗？有没有具体修复日期和计划？

> > https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/index.html#chart-type-map 这几个例子都是可以的
> 
> 我这边是没有发送referrer造成的，导致getscript代码中获取地图片段失败

使用IONIC打包App也是因为没有Referer导致跳转到error.html,请问现在有解决方案吗？

Hi, @Ovilia 
Have a method to display the label all the time?
